entry.title: [GRA5/GRA7/GRA9/SBG5/WAW1/SGP1/BHS5/SYD1/DE1/UK1/VA1/OR1][Public cloud]]End of life for Kubernetes1.20
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 21, 08:00 UTC  -  Mar 23, 17:00 UTC

Jan 4, 02:05 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 21/03/2023 08:00 UTC
End time : 23/03/2023 17:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact except for the apps that do not support the new version (1.21).
Service improvement : The aim of this maintenance is to upgrade deprecated clusters to a supported newer version (1.21).

entry.title: [BHS3-BHS5][Compute] - instances perturbation
entry.content:
Jan 11, 14:34 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 10/01/2023 21:45 UTC 
End time : 11/01/2023 14:00 UTC 
Service status: The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Root cause : A network management app had a malfunction.

Jan 11, 03:22 UTC
Update - The incident with vRacks is still open but there is significant progress since the last update.
Our technical teams remain working on the issue.

Jan 11, 01:31 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Jan 11, 01:27 UTC
Update - The issue with vRacks has been identified.
Our technical teams are hands on the issue.
We are checking the whole vRack infrastructure. Investigations are still ongoing.

Jan 11, 01:24 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 10/01/2023 23:30 UTC
Service impact : You might experience some perturbation or unavailability on instances spawning, snapshots, and deliveries.
Related Incident: [Global][vRack Private Network] - vRack outage
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [SYD, SGP, ERI, DE, BHS, GRA, SBG, RBX, WAW][ObjectStorage] - service perturbation
entry.content:
Jan 11, 10:37 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 10/01/2023 21:45 UTC
End Time : 11/01/2023 09:35 UTC
Root cause : [Global][vRack Private Network] - vRack outage End time for the outage in SYD, SGP, ERI, BHS, GRA, SBG, RBX, WAW on 11/01/2023 06:15 UTC and for LIM at 09:35 UTC
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jan 11, 09:50 UTC
Identified - Start time : 10/01/2023 21:45 UTC 
Service impact : Some degradation and perturbation are observed on ObjectStorage services.
Root cause : [Global][vRack Private Network] - vRack outage
Ongoing actions : The major part of the impacted services is operational, our teams are working to restore the remaining services.

Jan 11, 02:12 UTC
Update - Most impacted services (beside at WAW and UK) are being fixed.
Perturbations at WAW and UK are still ongoing and are being investigated by our technical teams.

Jan 11, 00:43 UTC
Update - The issue with vRacks has been identified.
Our technical teams are hands on the issue.
We are checking the whole vRack infrastructure. Investigations are still ongoing.

Jan 11, 00:07 UTC
Update - Further investigation reported that impacted ObjectStorage services were completely unavailable.
from : 10/01/2023 21:45 UTC
to : 10/01/2023 23:45 UTC

Jan 10, 23:48 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jan 10, 23:45 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 10/01/2023 21:45 UTC 
Service impact : Some degradation and perturbation are observed on ObjectStorage services.
Related Incident: [Global][vRack Private Network] - vRack outage
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are investigation the issue.
You may have experienced some unavailability. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
